entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 5 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
